title: CALL_MINIMAP_SCALEFORM_FUNCTION
content:
0x4C89C0ED// CallMinimapScaleformFunction
BOOL CALL_MINIMAP_SCALEFORM_FUNCTION(int miniMap, char* fnName);Parameters:miniMap: The minimap overlay ID.fnName: A function in the overlay's TIMELINE.This is similar to the PushScaleformMovieFunction natives, except it calls in the TIMELINE of a minimap overlay.
codeBlocks:
// CallMinimapScaleformFunction
BOOL CALL_MINIMAP_SCALEFORM_FUNCTION(int miniMap, char* fnName);
